attributes.action: We the undersigned Insist the government retract the declaration that the 22/05/13 murder was a terrorist act.
attributes.additional_details: To declare the murderers terrorists, not only glorifies them but condemns and further vilifies the Islamic peoples to be tarred with the same brush. The sole reason that this is being regarded as a terrorist act is the current  supposed natures of the three parties involved.The evidence as it currently stands in the absence of media inflation, is Murder. There may be no hint of pre-meditation. this could be road rage gone wrong. We must consider the fact far more carefully before we use dangerous loaded words such as terrorist which could Incite the ill informed to violence. The government should be more tactful in their handling of sensitive situations like this.
